General.Name: Yoantion Industrial Inc.Ltd.
General.Description: Yoantion Industrial Inc.,Ltd. manufactures and sells textile, printing, and dyeing machinery and accessories under YOANTION brand. Its products include Y2088 energy saving and environmental protection hot air stenter setting machines, modular designs, cloth racks and tracks, cloth feeding combination devices, rolling cars, pad car fabric process products, touch screen consoles, needle overfeeds, tent chains, door with adjustable devices, and oven systems. The company also offers energy saving and environmental-friendly exhaust systems, oven basic structures, trimming devices, independent drive devices of main chain, cloth output combination devices, cloth delivery devices, electric cabinet control systems, optional equipment, and other products. Yoantion Industrial Inc.,Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.
